title: RIP Cortana: Windows 11 is getting a new AI 'personal assistant'
description: Say hello to a more advanced AI assistant with a much more boring name.

title: Company of Heroes studio Relic Entertainment lays off over 100 employees
description: 121 employees were let go as part of a restructuring aimed at focusing on Relic's "core franchises."

title: The global release of Bandai Namco's new MMO has been delayed to 2024, but a beta is still coming later this year
description: Blue Protocol was revealed in 2019, and a global launch confirmed at the 2022 Game Awards.

title: Thanks for everything, WinRAR: Windows is finally getting native RAR support
description: It's taken decades, but Microsoft has come around to more zip formats including 7z, tar and gz.

title: Summer 2023 showcase schedule: Every gaming publisher livestream and Summer Game Fest event
description: Even without E3, all of this summer's gaming announcements are hitting during one big weekend in June.

title: Photoshop's new AI features look like magic
description: OK, now we're talking.

title: The gamer lawsuit against Microsoft - Activision deal suffers another blow
description: A judge denied a request for a preliminary injunction, saying the plaintiffs failed to show that they're likely to suffer "immediate irreparable harm" if the deal goes through.

title: Japanese YouTuber might be the first in the world arrested for posting gameplay clips
description: "I knew it was illegal, even as I was doing it."

title: DICE's former 'Mr Battlefield' has a new studio working on a 'next-generation online shooter'
description: Lars Gustavsson has partnered with three other former DICE devs to launch TTK Games.

title: Oh snapper, fishing is coming to Destiny 2 later today
description: Season of the Deep will feature a new fishing minigame.

title: How to unlock the Ancestral Forge in V Rising
description: Craft this upgrade to get access to legendary weapons.

title: War Thunder fans organise extraordinary review bombing campaign over reverted economy changes, studio pleads: 'If your goal is not to hurt the game, please use other, less destructive ways'
description: "It's become pretty well as bad as most Gacha games."

title: Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun review
description: Retro FPS Boltgun is blessed by the Emperor of Man.

title: Conquer Egypt and survive natural disasters in Total War: Pharaoh this October
description: Fight beneath the pyramids during the Bronze-Age Collapse.

title: Props to this decade-old fighting game for moving to new servers instead of shutting down in 2023
description: Killer Instinct isn't going anywhere.

title: F1 Manager 2023 is packed with upgrades, and offers a level of fidelity that rivals Codemasters' F1 series
description: Frontier's management sim brings an impressive pile of substantial new toys to play with here.

title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 Ti
description: The tightly regimented mid-range Ada card delivers no surprises.

title: The best Honkai: Star Rail Jing Yuan build
description: Call down a storm on unsuspecting foes with this five-star Erudition character.

title: This ridiculous shoe PC went from a 10-week mod project to a $6,000 custom Cooler Master gaming PC you can actually buy
description: Cooler Master just announced the Sneaker X is coming to stores, alongside the Cooling X with liquid-cooling chamber side panels.

title: In an act of auteur megalomania, Yoshi-P made the Final Fantasy 16 core team buy and watch Game of Thrones
description: Have any plans this evening? Now you do.

title: Blizzard execs sound very excited about AI, want to use it for level design, coding, and 'anti-toxicity'
description: A former WoW engineer says executives are "focusing on hype words that they think will sound impressive to shareholders".

title: Samsung is making the QD-OLED ultrawide panel of my dreams
description: This panel will hopefully be similar to the one in our pick for the best gaming monitor, but even wider.

title: Exoprimal is a throwback to weird, experimental early 2000s Capcom
description: Exoprimal could pass as a Hideki Kamiya joint, at least until you look at the battle pass.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #703: Tuesday, May 23
description: Trouble solving today's Wordle? Here's the help you need.

title: Ashfall is a Fallout-inspired MMO set in 'a whole new kind of wasteland'
description: Beta sign-ups are open now, and the first one is happening this July.
